title: Global energy transition investment ‘hit $500bn mark in 2020’
lead: Solar and wind received the lion’s share of renewable investments globally, according to a new report

title: Biden signs executive order to rejoin Paris climate change accord
lead: The president also signed an executive order to halt the construction of the controversial Keystone XL pipeline

title: Ørsted makes final investment decision on its first renewable hydrogen project
lead: The Danish demonstration project will use offshore wind energy to produce renewable hydrogen

title: COP26 seeks to recruit an ‘army of local volunteers’
lead: The volunteers are expected to support delegations with information on the conference venues, advice on how to move around the city and promote the best of what Glasgow has to offer

title: INEOS injects £100m into the creation of Oxford University Institute for ‘silent pandemic’
lead: The new body will work to develop solutions to antimicrobial resistance

title: EU approves €60m to support cleaner public transport in Portugal
lead: The funding will support the conversion of an old railway line into a route for electric buses connecting Coimbra with the municipalities of Lousã and Miranda do Corvo and the village of Serpins

title: Israeli lithium-ion battery offers EV full charge in five minutes
lead: The battery enables full charge in five minutes providing up to 300Km of driving range

title: Robots to dismantle nuclear power stations
lead: The £12 million-project will see long-reach robotic arms deliver faster and safer decommissioning of reactors in Japan and the UK

title: Portsmouth City Council wins £3.1m fund for home energy efficiency
lead: Up to 300 additional households across Portsmouth and Gosport are to benefit from the funding

title: All new build homes in the UK to be ‘zero carbon ready’ by 2025
lead: Under the new regulations, new buildings will produce 80% lower carbon emissions compared to current levels
